name: Yiddish Slang Quiz | Hebrew and Yiddish | 10 Questions

questions.text: A common Jewish mom's worry is that her fine son will come home with a non-Jewish girl - otherwise known as a what?
questions.explanation:
Shiksa.

	Oy....what I got for being the shiksa in that situation! Luckily it all worked out and now I have a fine Jewish husband :>)

questions.text: If you have a lot of gall, cheek, or nerve, you could be said in Yiddish to have what?
Which of these is a typical Yiddish word of disparagement?
questions.explanation:
Feh!.

	That can be literally or figuratively.
